page.title: 03 MONKTON FARLEIGH FETE.
page.content: On Saturday 29th June{Monkton Farleigh {church}held its{annual Fete}at{Monkton {Farleigh Manor.}The Fete was held to raise money for repairs to{St.Peters {church}in the village.There were ice creams and drink stalls,teas and skittles.There was a coconut stall a raffle and a flower stall.At 3.15pm 24 children from the{village School}did some{country dancing.}The dances were Circassian Circle,Sicilian Circle,2 square dances and a dance called Bridge of Athlone.It was a very hot day.Lots of people were winning footballs and teddy bears.There was a {Punch and Judy show}and there was a {juggling act.}Then there was the {skittles}final.After the{raffle}was drawn people started going home.
